Hurl.help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.targetHelp: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate

Super_Leap.help: Blunt Trauma can Leap to building tops without problem.
Super_Leap.targetHelp: Blunt Trauma can Leap to building tops without problem.

Exterminator_Gas.targetHelp: The Exterminator Gas has poisoned you. You are taking damage over time.

Scream.help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while slowing their movement and weakening their resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Scream.targetHelp: You are being buffeted by waves of sound and taking damage! Your damage resistance and movement speed has been reduced.

Shout.targetHelp: The sonic Shout has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Shockwave.help: You can call forth a tremendous Shockwave that can knock down foes and deal some Smashing and Energy damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Sonic_Dispersion.help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The SonicDispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Dispersion.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All Damage, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.targetHelp: The Sonic Bubble is granting you Resistance to all types of damage as well as Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting effects.

Sonic_Siphon.help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken his Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Siphon.targetHelp: Your Resistances have been weakened by the Sonic attack.

Dreadful_Wail.help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Dreadful_Wail.shortHelp: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -Recovery
Dreadful_Wail.targetHelp: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

Ethereal.help: Ghosts can make themselves Ethereal and shift out of the material plane. Ethereal ghosts are invisible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space.

Burst.help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at very long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Burst.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

Slug.help: Fires a single Slug at a targeted foe. Firing a single Slug is slower than firing a Burst, but deals more damage, is longer range, and can knock down foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Flamethrower.targetHelp: The Flamethrower has set you on fire and you are burning.

Ignite.help: Sprays a targeted location with accelerant from your flamethrower, igniting the location. Any foes that pass through the flames will be burned. Great for blocking doorways and small passages. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Ignite.targetHelp: You have been ignited! You are burning.

Sonic_Dispersion.help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The Sonic Dispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Dispersion.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All Damage except Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.targetHelp: The Sonic Bubble is granting you Resistance to all types of damage as well as Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting effects.
Sonic_Dispersion.targetShortHelp: +Res(All Damage but Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from most damage types with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Dispersion.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Shriek.help: You let forth a quick Shriek, damaging your target and weakening his Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Shriek.targetHelp: The sonic Shriek has weakened you. You are more vulnerable to damage.

Scream.help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening his resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Scream.targetHelp: You are being buffeted by waves of sound and taking damage! Your Damage Resistance has been reduced.

Sirens_Song.help: You send forth a subsonic pulse which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some minor damage. Your foes will remain unconscious for a good while, but will waken if disturbed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Long
Sirens_Song.targetHelp: The Siren's Song has rendered you unconscious.

Screech.targetHelp: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

Dreadful_Wail.help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
